definition: tolerance (allowed error)/common difference (of an arithmetic series)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: But the development of tolerancing design in mechanical product has lagged behind them greatly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，机械产品公差设计的发展却远远地滞后于它们。

sentences.english: The feature expert system which services tolerance analysis and tolerance synthesis is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一个服务于公差分析与综合的特征专家系统。

sentences.english: We consider the nonlinearly constrained tolerance allocation problems.
sentences.chinese: 我们考虑非线性约束的公差分配问题。

sentences.english: Dream big heart wide, learn to sea, rivers tolerance is self-cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 梦想大心宽，学会海洋，河流的公差是修养。

sentences.english: I am to go abroad on business tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天我要去外国出公差。

sentences.english: Closely held tolerances on the plate and bushing allow a precise fit to prevent rotation.
sentences.chinese: 紧紧举行板套允许公差和精确的适合防止旋转。

sentences.english: All dimensions and tolerances apply in a free state condition.
sentences.chinese: 所有的尺寸和公差都适用于单品状态下。

sentences.english: The method of calculating an assembly chain by the relative tolerance zone is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了用协调公差带解装配尺寸链的方法。

sentences.english: Tolerance in Geometry check for inter-segment connections multiplied by 2.
sentences.chinese: 几何公差在2检查连接部分乘以为国际米兰。

sentences.english: A procedure for de er-mining the kinematic errors arising from the tolerances of linkage parameters is presented.
sentences.chinese: 导出了计算由杆件公差引起的手部静态误差的公式。

sentences.english: So your boss is home sick today, huh? On a business trip you say?
sentences.chinese: 老板今天生病或是出公差，所以家里就没大人？

sentences.english: Optimum combination of tolerance levels and basic deviation of each element are given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了各元件的基本偏差及公差等级的优化组合。

sentences.english: Relative requirement is a tolerancing method of boundary control.
sentences.chinese: 相关要求是一种边界控制的公差设计方法。

sentences.english: If not allow for a larger ejection angle, then plastic parts radial tolerance to employ large.
sentences.chinese: 若不允许取较大脱模斜度时，则塑件径向公差宜取大。

sentences.english: Screeds to higher tolerances than conventional methods.
sentences.chinese: 比传统方法高公差找平。

sentences.english: Out of Roundness is the variation of the spline from a true circular configuration.
sentences.chinese: 圆度是花键与真圆的圆廓之间的公差。

definition: forced labor of feudal tenant (corvée)/bailiff of feudal yamen
bailiff responsible for catching criminals (in imperial China)
(old) servant hired to keep guard, run errands etc
door/doorman (old)/hanger-on of an aristocrat/social influence/pull/classifier for relatives, marriages etc
